mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET STATUS = #{status} where r_num = #{r_num}
UPDATE RESERVATION SET STATUS = #{status}, CANCEL_REASON = #{cancel_reason} where r_num = #{r_num}
mapper.select: select R_NUM, NAME, reserve.ROOM_NUM, space_num, to_char(R_START, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') R_START, to_char(R_END, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') R_END, STATUS, P_STATUS, to_char(R_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') R_DATE, AMOUNT, CANCEL_REASON from reservation reserve join room r on reserve.room_num = r.room_num where space_num = ANY(select space_num from space where host = #{name}) ORDER BY R_NUM DESC

select R_NUM, NAME, reserve.ROOM_NUM, space_num, to_char(R_START, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') R_START, to_char(R_END, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') R_END, STATUS, P_STATUS, to_char(R_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') R_DATE, AMOUNT, CANCEL_REASON from reservation reserve join room r on reserve.room_num = r.room_num and r_num = #{r_num} ORDER BY R_NUM DESC
